title: B/S/T:  T206 HOFers PSA or SGC
author: bounce

posts.post_title: B/S/T:  T206 HOFers PSA or SGC
posts.post_content:
Have decided I need to refocus my collecting and have a few extras to bargain with.

I would sell (so i will list a price) but probably prefer to trade if possible.  I'm especially interested in "trading down", so this might be a great opportunity for someone to "upgrade" from a few cards to one or two.

I can send additional pictures if interested, for space I'm only going to show fronts for now and list the back type.

One more thing, I do think I'm going to be in AC for the National Wednesday-Friday, so if someone was interested in settling up there that could probably be arranged.  Just let me know.

E90-1 Cy Young PSA 3 - $1,800
[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k602/davidratliff4/0%20-%20BST/IMG_5243.jpg[/IMG]

T206 Cy Young SGC 55 Polar Bear - $1,750
[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k602/davidratliff4/0%20-%20BST/IMG_5241.jpg[/IMG]

T206 Christy Mathewson PSA 6 White Cap Piedmont 350 - $4,250
[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k602/davidratliff4/0%20-%20BST/IMG_5247.jpg[/IMG]

T206 Walter Johnson PSA 4 Piedmont 350 (this one is PWCC High End Certified) - $1,850
[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k602/davidratliff4/0%20-%20BST/IMG_5249.jpg[/IMG]

T206 Walter Johnson PSA 3 Sweet Cap 150 - $1,300
[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k602/davidratliff4/0%20-%20BST/IMG_5252.jpg[/IMG]

T206 Nap Lajoie SGC 55 Piedmont 150 - $750
[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k602/davidratliff4/0%20-%20BST/IMG_5254.jpg[/IMG]

T206 Roger Bresnahan PSA 5.5 Piedmont 350 - $600 (would really like to trade down to a 4 on this one)
[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k602/davidratliff4/0%20-%20BST/IMG_5256.jpg[/IMG]

T206 John McGraw PSA 4 Piedmont 350-460 - $275
[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k602/davidratliff4/0%20-%20BST/IMG_5258.jpg[/IMG]

T206 Bobby Wallace PSA 4 Piedmont 150 - $225
[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k602/davidratliff4/0%20-%20BST/IMG_5260.jpg[/IMG]

PM or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url]

Thanks for looking

If trading, these are the only ones I would consider for now.

They need to be well centered and mostly crease free.  I don't mind rounded corners though, which is why PSA 3s or better could work.  And while I prefer PSA, I would consider equivalent SGC.  I'm not particular about backs, rare or otherwise.

Here's what I'm looking for:
Ty Cobb green portrait
Ty Cobb bat off
Ty Cobb bat on
Walter Johnson portrait - PSA 4 or better
Christy Mathewson portrait
Tris Speaker
John McGraw portrait
Eddie Collins portrait
Willie Keeler portrait
Fred Clarke portrait
Jimmy Collins portrait
Hugh Duffy
Hughie Jennings portrait
Frank Chance portrait (red or yellow)
Jack Chesbro portrait
Johnny Evers portrait
Clark Griffith portrait
Joe Mcginnity  portrait
Joe Tinker portrait
Rube Waddell portrait
Ed Walsh portrait
